Question.Subject: I seem to have a problem with the website Lockerz?
Question.Content: I wanna watch the videos but when I click on it, its black. Nothing shows up. I watched a video like 2 days ago and it was working fine but today I dont know what happened.
Question.ChosenAnswer: The site uses Macromedia to stream video. Port 1935. Make sure your firewall allows that port open. I watched the intro video with no lag or problems. Maybe the site's server was just busy when you tried it.

Answer.Content: The site uses Macromedia to stream video. Port 1935. Make sure your firewall allows that port open. I watched the intro video with no lag or problems. Maybe the site's server was just busy when you tried it.
